pixi.filters.color.ColorMatrixFilter

type
class
extends
pixi.core.renderers.webgl.filters.AbstractFilter
metadata
:native
"PIXI.filters.ColorMatrixFilter"

Constructor

new()
The ColorMatrixFilter class lets you apply a 5x5 matrix transformation on the RGBA color and alpha values of every pixel on your displayObject to produce a result with a new set of RGBA color and alpha values. It's pretty powerful! ```js var colorMatrix = new PIXI.ColorMatrixFilter(); container.filters = colorMatrix; colorMatrix.contrast(2); ```

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

matrix : Array<Float>

Sets the matrix of the color matrix filter
